description:
Soma thinks upon the circumstance of Shiomi Seminar’s closure and the reason why Hayama joined the Central without a fight. Dojima, who knew why Hayama became elite ten tells Soma it was because Azami has been pulling the wires from behind. With that knowledge, Soma heads to where Hayami is!
Finally, the day of the third exam is here! Soma’s revenge match begins!!
Source: crunchyroll
